ConditionDescription: In excellent brand new working condition.
Title: Vintage Style Horse Head Ladies Petite Pocket Watch Pendant Necklace with Chain
Description: Lovely vintage style ladies petite pocket watch pendant and chain necklace. The pocket watch has three horse heads on the front. Beautifully raised floral design on the backside. Made of a bronze colored metal. In working order, quartz battery, keeps good time. The watch measures 1" in diameter not including the stem. The chain is 31" long. In excellent working condition. Check out my Ebay store for other pocket watches for the various branches of the military, fire dept., police and other varieties. Comes gift wrapped.
